summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of MecaLab - L'Officina Digitale. All core functionality working correctly including navigation, contact form, i18n, and responsive design.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with navbar, hero section, animated 3D cube, services section
Language switcher toggles between IT/EN and updates all text correctly
STL Viewer component present with upload area and material info cards
Contact form has name, email, message fields with proper validation
Contact form submits successfully to Formspree endpoint (https://formspree.io/f/xdalaqjn)
Footer has correct contact info: aelmekauy@gmail.com, +39 347 8303184, LinkedIn profile
Breadcrumbs show correctly on all subpages
Mobile responsiveness works with collapsible navigation menu
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
Dark theme (slate-950) with orange accents (#f97316) implemented correctly
CSS 3D animated hero cube working without Three.js dependency
Material information cards display pricing for PLA, PETG, ABS, Carbon Fiber
Social media links present in footer (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok)
